dcterms:creator: A.P. Twinanda
S. Shehata
D. Mutter
J. Marescaux
M. De Mathelin
N. Padoy
dcterms:description: Cholec80 consists of 80 videos of cholecystectomy surgeries aimed at removing the gallbladder laparoscopically, monitored through an endoscope. The videos are recorded at a frame rate of 25 fps and downsampled to 1 fps, with binary presence annotations generated for tool detection.
dcterms:title: Cholec80

dcterms:creator: A. Vardazaryan
D. Mutter
J. Marescaux
N. Padoy
dcterms:description: The m2cai-tool-locations dataset is used for tool localization in laparoscopic videos, focusing on weakly-supervised learning techniques.
dcterms:title: m2cai-tool-locations
